Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Reroute at Harlem/Palmer
ShortDescription: 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harlem, Grand, Oak Park, North Avenue, and Harlem due to, street blockage at Harlem/Palmer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with significant delays near Western due to track work.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with significant delays near Western due to track work.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
